definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable

sentences.english: It's necessary for us to net the currant bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我们有必要用网盖上红醋栗树。

sentences.english: Some other drugs have to be taken on an empty stomach.
sentences.chinese: 而其他某些药物，必须在空腹服用。

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米线放进一个大碗里，然后用温水浸泡。

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亚搬进他的新屋子之前，也得要用烟熏。

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用实验证实了电磁波对生物呼吸过程的影响。

sentences.english: Use a pen to write your name.
sentences.chinese: 用原子笔写下你的名字。

sentences.english: The headwords in this dictionary are in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 本词典的词条用的是粗体字。

sentences.english: Too many magazines like to feature sleek models on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 太多的杂志喜欢用时尚模特儿作封面。

sentences.english: The application of chemical oil displacement agents for high temperature and salinity reservoir was prospected.
sentences.chinese: 分析了高温高盐油藏用化学驱油剂的应用前景。

sentences.english: Wants efficient changeovers between products with minimum downtime.
sentences.chinese: 用最少时间进行产品间转换。

sentences.english: The big black Bakelite phone rang at half past ten.
sentences.chinese: 十点半的时候，外壳用胶木做的电话响了。

sentences.english: I prefer to use debit card when shop on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 我通常喜欢用提款卡在网上购物。

sentences.english: The building is 3-storey high, which is made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 这座屋子高三层，是用外地的石头制作的。

sentences.english: It's the plural for heaven, so the heavens or the heavenly places is this Greek word.
sentences.chinese: 这里用的是复数，天国和神圣之地是同一个希腊词。

sentences.english: The beach life-guards usually flag one another for communication.
sentences.chinese: 海滨救生员通常用旗号传达信息。

sentences.english: The brushes have bristles of animal hair, with a very fine point.
sentences.chinese: 毛笔用动物的毛发制成，笔尖很细。

definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to replace/to take the place of
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
